title: Coconut Quinoa Breakfast Porridge
directions: In a medium-sized saucepan, melt coconut oil over medium heat. Add quinoa and oats, stirring and cooking for 3 minutes to toast the grains slightly. Stir in coconut milk, water, salt and cinnamon. Bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes, stirring a few times, until grains are softened and plump. If you would like them creamier and thicker, stir in another 1/3 cup of coconut milk and cook for a few minutes longer. Remove from heat and stir in honey or maple syrup.
Serve with toasted coconut and your favorite kind of jam.
Leftovers will last for 5 days in the refrigerator.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon solid coconut oil (or olive oil)
3/4 cup dry quinoa, rinsed using a colander
2 cups coconut milk (from plastic beverage containers sold in refrigerator case not aluminum cans)
Toasted coconut and jam for serving
